column4: can someone tell me why i have 2 different mac addresses for my router?   airodump gives me one mac address that my nic is associated with, i assume this is the wireless router im connected to...however, the sbin utlity "arp" gives me a different HWaddress for my default gateway's ip address. what is up with that
is your default gateway an ethernet?
...the mac that the arp utility is giving me doesnt match my wireles nic or my wired nic
